comment.author: 22233073@N03
comment._content: This book mentions a "Birdsall House" at 612 Flatbush Ave: books.google.com/books?id=v4cGmMe6_okC&pg=PA245#v=one... The Sanborn Map from 1905 shows a building that looks exactly like this one just south of that present day address. sanborn.umi.com/

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: On July 06, 2011, jeffr_travel suggested where this photo was taken; thank you for your efforts to #mapBK!
